page.title: 09THE TAVERNERS, WARNINGLID
page.content: Before my Dad bought the{Taverners}it was called{Bradleys}and before that it was called{Markwells. We have got{7 hotel rooms}and 6 have bath_rooms.The price of a{single room is{Â£15.00}and{Â£30}for a{twin or double room for{bed and breakfast.}The Bridal Suite costs Â£40 a night. We have owned it for about a year and a half.It has got{a disco, a wine bar, {a garden bar, a restaurant, a cocktail {bar and a barbecue. There is a dinner and dance every Wednesday and Saturday which costs Â£10. An{English breakfast}costs{Â£2.80}and a{3_course lunch on Sundays}is{Â£6.50 and on{other days}it is{Â£4.75. A{3_course dinner is Â£6.90. The oldest bit of the Taverners is about four hundred years old and the newest is about 60 years old.
